item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m Sarah. I’m an underground cartoonist, professional illustrator, and wandering ne’er-do-well. I’ve been telling stories and creating work for what is basically my entire adult life, and this is where I’ve decided to place my thoughts on doing so, as well as ramblings about life in general. This blog is mainly where I write about things that hold my interest, and is also where I put notes on books, records, and other such things that I’m working on.
